Class Monster

java.lang.Object
dev.mikita.darkforest.core.sprite.ASprite
dev.mikita.darkforest.model.entity.Monster
public class Monster extends ASprite
The type Monster.

A class that represents a particular monster.

      Description copied from class: ASprite
      Update.
